with v_auth as (
  select 
        employee_id as employeeId
      , employee_name
      , duty_id
      , duty_name
  from ads_biz.ads_biz_emp_dept_relationship_td auth_emp
  where auth_emp.enabled_flag = 1
  and ( auth_emp.lv3_id = 15182 or auth_emp.lv3_id = 84)
      and auth_emp.lv3_id = '15182'
)
, v_delegation as (
    select
        t1.task_id,
      group_concat(cast(t1.reason as string),',') as mandatory_reason,
      group_concat(t1.memo,';') as mandatory_comment
    from(
      select
        t1.task_id,
        t1.reason,
        t1.memo,
        row_number() over(partition by t1.task_id,t1.mandatory_id order by t1.updation_date desc) as rk
      from bigdata_app.task_assign_delegation_visit t1 
      left join bigdata_app.task_assign_delegation_visit t2 ON t1.task_id = t2.task_id 
         and t2.operation = 'delete' and t1.mandatory_id = t2.mandatory_id and t1.updation_date < t2.updation_date
      where t1.operation = 'add' and t2.id IS NULL
    ) t1
    where rk = 1
    group by task_id
)
, v_scheduler_withmate as (
  select 
        scheduler.id  
  from bigdata_app.v_task_template_and_visit_detail_withmate_micro  scheduler
  join v_auth auth on auth.employeeId = scheduler.employee_id
  where  task_type <> 20 
  /*协同任务人*/
  /*主任务人*/
    and scheduler.task_type in ( 10 )
    and scheduler.assess_type  in ( 10,20 )
      and scheduler.limit_date >= '2025-01-01 00:00:00' and scheduler.limit_date <= '2025-01-31 23:59:59' 
  /*下发模式*/
  /*任务来源*/
  /*需拜访次数*/
  /*已拜访次数*/
  /* 结论选择： - 代表 选择空的，  比如：前端传conclusionId="1,2,3,-" 将处理成 (conclusion_id in (1,2,3,999) or conclusion_id is null ) */
  /*创建人*/
  /*创建人部门*/
  /*事项状态*/
    and scheduler.status != 4
   /*从任务报备详情中跳转需定位唯一一条记录*/
)
, v_scheduler as (
  select /*+ set_var(parallel_fragment_exec_instance_num=1) */
        scheduler.id                /*事项id*/
      , scheduler.template_id
      , scheduler.template_version
      , scheduler.assign_batch_no
      , scheduler.task_id           /*任务ID*/
      , scheduler.task_name
      , scheduler.employee_id
      , cast(scheduler.cust_id as int) as cust_id /*客户ID：强转类型为性能优化*/
      , scheduler.cust_name
      , scheduler.report_status   /*报备状态*/
      , scheduler.report_type
      , scheduler.start_date
      , scheduler.limit_date
      , scheduler.report_time
      , scheduler.assess_type     /*考核类型*/
      , scheduler.report_comment /* 20211018 增加展示报备原因 */
      , scheduler.visit_time /*拜访时间*/
      , scheduler.item_status/*事项状态*/
      , scheduler.assign_reason /*指派理由: 格式：xxx-xxxx  */
      , split(scheduler.assign_reason,'-') reason_arr   /*指派理由按照-解析为数组 */
      , scheduler.conclusion_id /*拓展客户回访 事项结论*/
      , scheduler.conclusion_memo /*拓展客户回访 事项备注*/
      , scheduler.conclusion_time /*拓展客户回访 完成时间*/
      , scheduler.task_type /*应用类型*/
      , scheduler.mandatory_id
      , scheduler.mandatoryConclusionTime
      , scheduler.is_delegation
      , scheduler.delegation_status  /*授权状态*/
      , scheduler.task_status             /*任务状态*/
      , scheduler.can_conclusion
      , scheduler.time_status
      , scheduler.item_node_status
      , scheduler.itemPeriod
      , scheduler.remainTime
      , scheduler.visitStatus
      , scheduler.isOverdue
      , scheduler.conclusion_status
      , scheduler.done_time
      , auth_emp.employee_name
      , auth_emp.duty_name
      , scheduler.delegation_time /* 授权时间 */
      , scheduler.source
      , scheduler.revoke_time
      , scheduler.approval_time
      , scheduler.created_by as createdByName /* 创建人 */
      , case when scheduler.task_type = 10 and scheduler.`item_node_status` in(1011,1012) then  scheduler.sign_in_type
             when scheduler.task_type = 20 and scheduler.`item_node_status` in(2011,2012) then  scheduler.sign_in_type
             when scheduler.task_type = 30 and scheduler.`item_node_status` in(3012) then scheduler.sign_in_type
        else null end as  signInType
      , scheduler.plan_visit_cnt as planVisitCnt /*需拜访次数*/
      , coalesce(scheduler.already_visit_cnt,0) as alreadyVisitCnt /*已拜访次数*/
      , scheduler.mate_name as mateEmployeeName /*协防人*/
      , scheduler.mate_duty_name as mateDutyName /*协防人岗位*/
      , scheduler.task_mode as taskMode /*任务模式*/
      , scheduler.task_source as taskSource /*任务来源*/
      , scheduler.upgrade_flag as upgradeFlag /*升级标识*/
      , coalesce(scheduler.upgrade_flag,-1)  as hasUpgrade/*升级标识*/
      , scheduler.has_know_potential hasKnowPotential
      , scheduler.has_potential hasPotential
      , scheduler.mate as mateEmployeeId /*协同人Id*/
  from bigdata_app.task_template_and_visit_detail_all_micro scheduler
  left semi join v_scheduler_withmate withmate on scheduler.id = withmate.id
  join ads_biz.ads_biz_emp_dept_relationship_td auth_emp on auth_emp.employee_id = scheduler.employee_id
  where  task_type <> 20 
    and scheduler.task_type in ( 10 )
    and scheduler.assess_type  in ( 10,20 )
  /*主任务人员*/
  /*任务人员*/
  /*协同人员*/
      and scheduler.limit_date >= '2025-01-01 00:00:00' and scheduler.limit_date <= '2025-01-31 23:59:59'
  /*下发模式*/
  /*任务来源*/
  /*需拜访次数*/
  /*已拜访次数*/
  /* 结论选择： - 代表 选择空的，  比如：前端传conclusionId="1,2,3,-" 将处理成 (conclusion_id in (1,2,3,999) or conclusion_id is null ) */
    /*创建人*/
  /*创建人部门*/
       /*事项状态*/
    and scheduler.status != 4
   /*从任务报备详情中跳转需定位唯一一条记录*/
)
/*所有任务*/
, v_cust_combine as (
/* 将后台和资源客分别关联维表，取最后跟进时间，要排序*/
  select
      scheduler.id as itemId
    , scheduler.template_id   as templateId  /*模板id*/
    , scheduler.template_version  as templateVersion    /*模板版本*/
    , scheduler.assign_batch_no as assignBatchNo
    , scheduler.task_id as taskId
    , scheduler.task_name as taskName
    , scheduler.employee_id as employeeId
    , scheduler.employee_name as employeeName
    , scheduler.duty_name as dutyName
    , scheduler.cust_id as custId
    , case when scheduler.source = 10 or scheduler.source is null then scheduler.cust_id end as customerId
    , case when scheduler.source = 20 then scheduler.cust_id end as resourceId
    , scheduler.source
    , scheduler.cust_name as itemName
    , scheduler.assess_type as assessType   /*考核类型*/
    , scheduler.report_status as reportStatus/*报备状态（0：无报备；1：已报备；2：报备中）*/
    , scheduler.report_time as reportTime
    , coalesce(scheduler.report_type, 0) as reportType /*0:无报备*/
    , scheduler.report_comment as reportComment
    , scheduler.delegation_status as delegationStatus/*授权状态（-1：未授权；0：已授权，任务未完成；1：已授权，任务完成；2：已授权，拜访失效）*/
    , case when scheduler.delegation_status <> -1 then scheduler.id end as delegationId
    , scheduler.start_date as startDate/*开始时间*/
    , scheduler.limit_date as limitDate/*结束时间*/
    , scheduler.assign_reason as assignReason /*指派理由 XXX-XXX格式 */
    , scheduler.reason_arr[1] as ruleReason /*指派理由 第一个格式 */
    , scheduler.reason_arr[2] as templateRemark /*指派理由 第二个格式*/  
    , scheduler.item_status as itemStatus/*事项状态*/
    , scheduler.visit_time as visitTime
    , scheduler.task_type as taskType/*事项类型（字典同任务指派模板里的任务类型）*/
    , scheduler.conclusion_id as conclusionId/*拓展客户回访 事项结论*/
    , scheduler.conclusion_memo as conclusionMemo/*拓展客户回访 事项备注*/
    , scheduler.conclusion_time as conclusionTime/*拓展客户回访 完成时间*/
    , scheduler.mandatory_id as mandatoryId
    , split(scheduler.mandatory_id, ',') as mandatoryIdArr
    , scheduler.mandatoryConclusionTime /*授权完成时间*/
    , scheduler.task_status as status             /*任务状态*/
    , scheduler.is_delegation  as isDelegation
    , scheduler.itemPeriod/*事项周期（单位：天）*/
    , scheduler.remainTime/*剩余时间（单位：天）*/
    , scheduler.isOverdue
    , scheduler.can_conclusion      as   canConclusion
    , scheduler.time_status         as   timeStatus
    , scheduler.conclusion_status as concludeStatus
    , scheduler.visitStatus /* 最新访客: 0: 无记录；1: 无效记录 */
    , scheduler.done_time as doneTime
    , scheduler.createdByName /* 创建人 */
    , scheduler.done_time as finishDate /*完成时间*/
    , scheduler.revoke_time as revokeTime /*撤销时间*/
    , scheduler.item_node_status as itemNodeStatus
    , scheduler.delegation_time as mandatoryApplyTime /* 授权时间 */
    , t1.last_follow_time as lastFollowTime /* 最后跟进时间 */
    , t1.customer_code as customerCode
    , t1.market_name as marketName
    , t1.market_id as marketId
    , t1.assistant_id as assistantId
    , t1.assistant_name as assistantName
    , coalesce(if(t1.customer_id is not null, t1.customer_short_name, t1.customer_full_name), scheduler.cust_name) as customerName
    , concat(t1.city, t1.county) as address
    , t1.last_shipment_date as lastShipmentDate
    , t1.last_sign_time as latestVisitTime/* 最后拜访时间 */
    , scheduler.signInType
    , scheduler.planVisitCnt /*需拜访次数*/
    , scheduler.alreadyVisitCnt /*已拜访次数*/
    , scheduler.taskMode as taskMode /*任务模式*/
    , scheduler.taskSource as taskSource /*任务来源*/
    , scheduler.mateEmployeeName as mateEmployeeName /*协防人*/
    , scheduler.mateDutyName as mateDutyName /*协防人岗位*/
    , scheduler.upgradeFlag /*升级标识*/
    , t1.regional_relationship as regionalRelationship  /*人客区域关系 */
    , t1.regional_relationship as regionType 
    , scheduler.hasUpgrade
    , scheduler.hasKnowPotential
    , scheduler.hasPotential
    , t1.mtc_distance
  from ads_biz.ads_biz_customer_combine_td t1
  right join v_scheduler scheduler on t1.combine_id = scheduler.cust_id and (case when scheduler.source = 10 then 0 when scheduler.source = 20 then 1 end) = t1.customer_type
     and t1.last_task_assign_time >= '2025-01-01 00:00:00' - interval 3 month /*往前推3月，不然按结束时间查时可能少数据*/
  where 1 = 1
)
/*过滤授权人岗位*/
, v_res as (
    select * from (
      select 
          t1.* 
        , t5.mandatory_reason as mandatoryReason /* 授权原因 */
        , t5.mandatory_comment as mandatoryComment /* 授权备注 */
            , t4.pre_payment_sales_amt1 as prePaymentAmt /*拜访前额*/
            , t4.payment_sales_amt as curPaymentAmt /*当前额*/
            , t4.next_payment_sales_amt1 as nextPaymentAmt  /*拜访后额*/
            , coalesce(t4.next_payment_sales_amt1, 0) - coalesce(t4.pre_payment_sales_amt1, 0) as diffPaymentAmt /* 访后差额 */
            , t4.pre_payment_voyage_sales_amt1 as    prePaymentVoyageAmt /*拜访前航空额*/
            , t4.next_payment_voyage_sales_amt1 as nextPaymentVoyageAmt /*拜访后航空额*/
            , coalesce(t4.next_payment_voyage_sales_amt1, 0) - coalesce(t4.pre_payment_voyage_sales_amt1, 0) as diffPaymentVoyageAmt /* 访后航空差额 */
            , t4.pre_payment_exclude_added_all_fee1 as preAddAmt /*拜访前增值费*/
            , t4.next_payment_exclude_added_all_fee1 as nextAddAmt /*拜访后增值费*/
            , coalesce(t4.next_payment_exclude_added_all_fee1, 0) - coalesce(t4.pre_payment_exclude_added_all_fee1, 0) as diffAddAmt /* 访后增值费差额 */
            , case when coalesce(t4.next_payment_sales_amt1, 0) = 0 and coalesce(t4.pre_payment_sales_amt1, 0) = 0 then 2
              when coalesce(t4.next_payment_sales_amt1, 0) >= coalesce(t4.pre_payment_sales_amt1, 0) then 0
              when coalesce(t4.next_payment_sales_amt1, 0) < coalesce(t4.pre_payment_sales_amt1, 0) then 1 end as afterVisitType 
        , t1.mtc_distance as mtcDistance   /*人客距离*/
    from v_cust_combine t1 
    /*未访流失客*/
        left join ads_biz.ads_biz_customer_visit_cm t4 on t1.custId = t4.customer_id and '2025-01-01' = t4.dmonth
    left join v_delegation t5 on t1.itemId = t5.task_id
    where 1=1
        
  ) as t where 1=1 
)
select 
      prePaymentAmt
    , curPaymentAmt 
    , nextPaymentAmt  
    , diffPaymentAmt 
    , prePaymentVoyageAmt 
    , nextPaymentVoyageAmt
    , diffPaymentVoyageAmt
    , preAddAmt
    , nextAddAmt
    , diffAddAmt
    , postVisitDerate
    , postVisitIncreate
    , postVisitNotShipped
    , rowTotal
    , deepExcavationGoods
    , newCustomerFollow
    , maintainCustomerRelations
    , lossRecall
    , tillyEnhancement
    , handlingExceptions
    , securityRisks    
    , empoweringOperations
    , nationalMarketing
    , mobaiCustomer
    , divisionMajorClients
    , otherReason   
    , mateDutyNameArr
from 
(
    select 
          sum(coalesce(prePaymentAmt,0)) as prePaymentAmt /*拜访前额*/
        , sum(coalesce(curPaymentAmt,0)) as curPaymentAmt /*当前额*/
        , sum(coalesce(nextPaymentAmt,0)) as nextPaymentAmt  /*拜访后额*/
        , sum(coalesce(diffPaymentAmt, 0)) as diffPaymentAmt /* 拜访差额 */
        , sum(coalesce(prePaymentVoyageAmt,0)) as prePaymentVoyageAmt /*拜访前航空额*/
        , sum(coalesce(nextPaymentVoyageAmt,0)) as nextPaymentVoyageAmt /*拜访后航空额*/
        , sum(coalesce(diffPaymentVoyageAmt, 0)) as diffPaymentVoyageAmt /* 拜访航空差额 */
        , sum(coalesce(preAddAmt,0)) as preAddAmt /*拜访前增值费*/
        , sum(coalesce(nextAddAmt,0)) as nextAddAmt /*拜访后增值费*/
        , sum(coalesce(diffAddAmt, 0)) as diffAddAmt /* 拜访增值差额 */
        , count(distinct case when afterVisitType = 1 then custId end) as postVisitDerate   /* 访后增额客个 */
        , count(distinct case when afterVisitType = 0 then custId end) as postVisitIncreate  /* 访后下滑客个 */
        , count(distinct case when afterVisitType = 2 then custId end) as postVisitNotShipped  /* 访后未走货客个 */        
        , count(1) as rowTotal
        , array_filter(array_distinct(array_agg(mateDutyName)),x-> coalesce(x,'') <> '') mateDutyNameArr /*协同人岗位数组*/
    from v_res 
    where 1 = 1 
) A
CROSS JOIN 
(
    select 
          sum(if(ruleReason = '深挖货量',1,0)) as deepExcavationGoods
        , sum(if(ruleReason = '新客回访',1,0)) as newCustomerFollow
        , sum(if(ruleReason = '客户维护',1,0)) as maintainCustomerRelations
        , sum(if(ruleReason = '流失召回',1,0)) as lossRecall
        , sum(if(ruleReason = '提利增收',1,0)) as tillyEnhancement
        , sum(if(ruleReason = '处理异常',1,0)) as handlingExceptions
        , sum(if(ruleReason = '安全风险',1,0)) as securityRisks    
        , sum(if(ruleReason = '赋能运营',1,0)) as empoweringOperations
        , sum(if(ruleReason = '全民营销',1,0)) as nationalMarketing
        , sum(if(ruleReason = '陌拜客户',1,0)) as mobaiCustomer
        , sum(if(ruleReason = '大客户划分指派',1,0)) as divisionMajorClients
        , sum(if(ruleReason = '其他',1,0)) as otherReason        
    from v_res 
) B;

table_meta.ads_biz.ads_biz_emp_dept_relationship_td:
CREATE TABLE `ads_biz_emp_dept_relationship_td` (
  `employee_id` bigint(20) NULL COMMENT "员工id",
  `employee_name` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "员工名称",
  `employee_number` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "员工号",
  `duty_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "工作职务id",

  `department_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "所属部门id（报表统计使用）",

  `ori_department_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "来源部门id",

  `lv4_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "四级部门id",
  `lv5_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "五级部门id",
  `lv6_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "六级部门id",
  `lv7_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "七级部门id",
  `lv8_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "八级部门id",
  `lv9_id` int(11) NULL COMMENT "九级部门id",

  `lv2_name` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "二级部门名称",
  `lv3_name` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "三级部门名称",
  `lv4_name` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "四级部门名称",
  `lv5_name` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "五级部门名称",
  `lv6_name` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "六级部门名称",
  `lv7_name` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "七级部门名称",
  `lv8_name` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "八级部门名称",
  `lv9_name` varchar(65533) NULL COMMENT "九级部门名称",
  `charge_id_sets` array<bigint(20)> NULL COMMENT "部门负责人id集合",
  `charge_name_sets` array<varchar(65533)> NULL COMMENT "部门负责人名称集合",
  `induction_duration` int(11) NULL COMMENT "司龄",
  `induction_duration_range` smallint(6) NULL COMMENT "司龄区间",
